abstract: Last month, Citigroup released this resignation letter from Roberto Hernández Ramírez, who had served on the bank’s board since 2001. In the letter, Mr. Hernández, who is chairman of Citigroup’s Banamex unit in Mexico, said that “it is time to step down.”
